sources.title: Cold Sweat
sources.description: Charles Bronson, Liv Ullman, James Mason, and the gorgeous Jill Ireland star in this action packed movie about a ruthless drug runner who holds a man's family hostage. A great film for Charles Bronson fans.

metadata.Plot: Joe Martin, a quiet American, lives a quiet life in the South of France renting boats to tourists. He is happily married to Fabienne and has a twelve-year-old daughter named Mich√®le. But the quiet man has a past: ten years before, Joe (then Moran) had escaped with four other convicts, among whom the sadistic ex-mercenary Katanga. Seeing the latter brutally kill an M. P., Joe had abandoned his accomplices and left with the car. One night, Captain Ross, Katanga, Whitey and Fausto re-appear..
metadata.Writer: Richard Matheson, Shimon Wincelberg, Albert Simonin
